info.name: LinkedIn Insights Microservice API

request.description:
Get a LinkedIn page by page_id.

- If page exists in DB ‚Üí returns from database
- If not ‚Üí scrapes LinkedIn, stores in DB, returns response

response.name: Success - Page Found
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "page_id": "acme-corp",
    "name": "Acme Corporation",
    "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/acme-corp",
    "linkedin_internal_id": "123456",
    "description": "Leading technology company specializing in innovative solutions.",
    "website": "https://acme.com",
    "industry": "Technology",
    "total_followers": 50000,
    "head_count": 500,
    "specialities": "Software Development, AI, Cloud Computing",
    "profile_image_url": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/example.jpg",
    "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"
}

response.name: Error - Page Not Found

request.description:
Get list of LinkedIn pages with filtering and pagination.

**Filters:**
- `follower_count_min`: Minimum number of followers
- `follower_count_max`: Maximum number of followers
- `industry`: Filter by industry (partial match)
- `page_name`: Filter by page name (partial match, case-insensitive)

**Pagination:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `page_size`: Items per page (default: 20, max: 100)

response.name: Success - Filtered Results
response.body:
{
    "items": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "page_id": "acme-corp",

            "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "page_id": "tech-startup",
            "name": "Tech Startup Inc",
            "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/tech-startup",

    "has_previous": false
}

request.description:
Get posts for a LinkedIn page.

Returns recent 10-15 posts (default 15) with pagination support.

Posts are ordered by `posted_at` descending (newest first).

response.name: Success - Posts Found
response.body:
{
    "items": [
        {

request.description:
Get employees/followers for a LinkedIn page.

Returns list of employees/followers with pagination support.

response.name: Success - Followers Found
response.body:

request.description: Health check endpoint to verify API is running
